backend/main.mo: Main actor for the Beast Ride ICP backend, defining product, category, collection, order, and user profile types with CRUD operations protected by role-based access control (admin/user). Includes mixins for blob storage and authorization, and uses a migration hook for schema upgrades.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades legacy product records (adding an inventory field defaulting to 100) and seeds initial categories, collections, and orders maps when the actor state is upgraded.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (admin dashboard, orders section, products section, etc.) to their source files, component dependencies, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated JSON summaries of all frontend source files, describing the purpose and key implementation details of each component, hook, page, and style file in the Beast Ride React frontend.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used by shadcn-ui components.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Beast Ride Vite/React app, mounting the React root and loading the main TSX entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for Home, Collection, ProductDetail, and Admin pages, wrapped in CartProvider and a shared Layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/Categories: Admin UI section for managing product categories and collections, supporting add/edit/delete operations and product assignment to collections via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrdersSect: Admin UI section that displays all orders in a table with status badges and allows updating each order's status via a dropdown menu.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Modal form component for adding or editing a product, with fields for name, price, description, category, image, and inventory, using add/update product mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductsSe: Admin UI section that lists all products in a table with options to add, edit, or delete products, delegating form handling to ProductFormModal.
frontend/src/components/AdminSidebar.tsx: Sticky dark sidebar component for the admin dashboard with Beast Ride branding, nav links for Orders/Products/Categories sections with red active state, and a logout button showing the user's truncated principal.
Wrapper component that triggers a fade-in-up CSS animation when the section enters the viewport, with optional transition delay support.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: A slide-in cart drawer component that displays cart items, quantity controls, remove buttons, a free shipping progress bar, and a checkout flow using CartContext.
frontend/src/components/CategorySplit.ts: A two-panel section displaying 'Bike Accessories' and 'Car Performance' category cards with images and hover effects that navigate to filtered shop pages.
frontend/src/components/CinematicParalla: A parallax hero section with a night-road background image and an animated 'DOMINATE THE ROAD' heading that triggers on intersection.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedProducts: A 3D-style product carousel with scaling/opacity effects, touch swipe support, and add-to-cart functionality, fetching products via a React Query hook.
frontend/src/components/FilterSidebar.ts: A sidebar component with category filter buttons (All, Bike Accessories, Car Performance) that highlights the active selection and calls an onChange callback.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A site footer with shop links, support links, and social media icon buttons (Instagram, Facebook, X, YouTube) arranged in a three-column grid.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: A fixed navigation header that transitions from transparent to opaque on scroll, includes desktop nav links, a cart icon with item count badge, and a mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-viewport hero section with a background image, gradient overlays, animated red glow, headline text, and a 'Shop Performance' CTA button that navigates to /shop.
frontend/src/components/InstagramCommuni: Displays a 4-image community photo grid with Instagram icon overlays and an animated section header encouraging users to tag @beastride.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapper that composes Header, Footer, CartDrawer, and a main content area with a dark background.
frontend/src/components/MobileNav.tsx: Slide-in mobile navigation drawer with a backdrop overlay, logo, close button, and links to Home, Shop All, and category pages.
frontend/src/components/PerformanceHighl: Three-column section showcasing brand value propositions (Speed, Durability, Rider Approval) with custom SVG icons and hover border effects.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Clickable product card displaying image, category, name, price, and an add-to-cart button; navigates to the product detail page on click.
frontend/src/components/ProductTabs.tsx: Tabbed UI component for a product detail page with Description, Specifications, and Shipping tabs, featuring an animated sliding indicator.
Horizontally scrollable row of related ProductCards filtered by category, with skeleton loading states and a fallback to other products.
frontend/src/components/Reviews.tsx: Testimonials section rendering a grid of four hardcoded customer review cards with star ratings, review text, reviewer name, and product reference.
frontend/src/context/CartContext.tsx: React context provider managing shopping cart state including items, quantities, open/close state, subtotal, item count, and free-shipping progress tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using the user's Internet Identity, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntersectionObserv: Custom hook that uses IntersectionObserver to track whether a referenced element is in the viewport, with configurable threshold, rootMargin, and triggerOnce options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMutations.ts: Defines TanStack Query mutation hooks for CRUD operations on orders, products, categories, and collections, each invalidating the relevant query cache on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for fetching products, categories, collections, and orders from the backend actor, with appropriate caching and enabled conditions.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollPosition.ts: Custom hook that tracks the window's vertical scroll position using a requestAnimationFrame-throttled scroll event listener.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Barlow fonts, sets up Tailwind layers, defines CSS custom properties for the Beast Ride dark theme, and declares reusable component classes like beast-btn and metal-text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with TanStack QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin dashboard page that gates access behind Internet Identity login and renders section-based content (orders, products, categories) via a sidebar navigation.
frontend/src/pages/Collection.tsx: Displays a filterable product collection page with a category sidebar, product grid, and loading skeletons. Reads the initial category from URL search params and filters products accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Composes the homepage by assembling all major section components in order: Hero, CategorySplit, FeaturedProductsCarousel, PerformanceHighlight, CinematicParallax, Reviews, and InstagramCommunity.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetail.tsx: Renders a single product detail page with image, metadata, quantity selector, and add-to-cart functionality, plus loading skeletons and a not-found fallback state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading URL query parameters from both standard and hash-based routing, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with Beast Ride brand color tokens, custom fonts (Barlow Condensed/Barlow), red glow box shadows, and keyframe animations like sweep, fadeInUp, and redPulse.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state including version, architectural notes, known issues, and a registry of all implemented features for the Beast Ride ICP storefront and admin dashboard.
